item.title: Manhunt under way after two police officers shot dead in rural Australian town
item.description: Australian police say a "heavily armed" male suspect escaped into the bush after the shooting in Victoria state.

item.title: French PM fights for survival as rivals refuse to support confidence vote
item.description: Opposition parties say they will not back Prime Minister Fran√ßois Bayrou after a he called the vote over deep budget cuts.

item.title: Australia accuses Iran of directing antisemitic attacks on cafe and synagogue
item.description: Australia orders Iran's ambassador to leave the country following intelligence services' allegations.

item.title: Trump orders removal of Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook
item.description: Cook says the US president "has no authority to do so" in defiance of Trump's escalatory move against the central bank.

item.title: South Korea's charm offensive and other takeaways from Trump meeting
item.description: Ahead of Lee's White House visit, anxieties were bubbling in Seoul that the meeting could turn bitter.
